intro: Oreocharis convexa, commonly known as the convex oreocharis, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family. This species is characterized by its unique, showy flowers that often have a distinctive coloration and structure. The plant typically grows in rocky or forested areas, preferring cool and moist environments. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for both horticultural study and conservation efforts.
